You are using version '19485 SVN' of JOSM. Stable version: 19481 Development version: 19485

JOSM needs help with translations and the online help. Please help in the JOSM I18n contest.

Getting Started

  • Download some existing data from OSM using Download data on the File menu or the download button . If you have questions during your very first edit, the Introduction page will assist you.

Getting Help

  • Online help: Help on the Help menu or press F1 as required to get context sensitive help. Open Help now.
  • Join the forum or see the OSM Wiki page Contact channels for more ways to contact the OpenStreetMap community

News

  • 2026-02-01 weeklyOSM: The weekly round-up of OSM news, issue #810, is now available.
  • 2026-02-01 (stable version 19481)
    • Added languages Laotian, Nynorsk and Latvian.
    • The Debian repository and newer Ubuntu repositores have a new signing key.
  • More news ...

Contributing to JOSM

  • Help translating JOSM into your language! Currently 100% of program texts are done.

Remember the golden rules of OpenStreetMap:

  • Don't copy from other maps
  • Have fun!
